Epic Summer Sale: Get Civilization VI: Platinum Edition for Free
 [Jul 17, 2025, 6:52 pm ET] – Share – Viewing Comments

The summer sale is now underway on the Epic Games Store, offering thousands of games with discounts, and a 20% Epic Rewards on all your purchases. And since it's Thursday, the store features a new 100% discount, as everyone can snag the Windows edition of Sid Meier’s Civilization VI Platinum Edition completely free. It's yours to keep if you act by 11:00 am EDT next Thursday, when the store will begin handing out free copies of Legion TD 2. Here's what's included in this bundle of the "just one more turn" strategy sequel:

Sid Meier’s Civilization VI: Platinum Edition is the perfect entry point for PC gamers who have yet to experience the addictive gameplay that has made Civilization one of the greatest game series of all time.

  • Sid Meier’s Civilization VI
  • Civilization VI – Vikings Scenario Pack
  • Civilization VI – Poland Civilization & Scenario Pack
  • Civilization VI – Australia Civilization & Scenario Pack
  • Civilization VI – Persia and Macedon Civilization & Scenario Pack
  • Civilization VI – Nubia Civilization & Scenario Pack
  • Civilization VI – Khmer and Indonesia Civilization & Scenario Pack
  • Civilization VI: Rise and Fall expansion
  • Civilization VI: Gathering Storm expansion

My favorite Civ is still 4 I think, though I played 5 for thousands of hours. I can't remember but I don't think I have tried 6 yet. 7 is getting brutalized by longtime Civ fans for a lot of apparently unwelcome changes, similar to when EA stupidly tried turning Battlefield into Apex Legends and Dead Space into Farmville.

And Star Wars Battlefront 2 into an unregulated predatory casino.

EDIT: Brainfart. My daughter and I played 6 for a million hours together.
"We live on a placid island of ignorance in the midst of black seas of infinity, and it was not meant that we should voyage far."

"Universal compassion is the only guarantee of morality."

Lord Gaben’s photo is mounted above my bed and I pray to him each night and will remain faithful. Enjoy an epic snag on this one (pun intended) I’ll pass but a great series to get into.
There's a possibility epic pays out to the devs for every game snagged, so even if not planning to play, wouldn't hurt to snag through the web link (no need to install client as someone mentioned)
https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/free-games
This URL is always the same for the free games, Blue's links above go to general store (which has the free game when you scroll) or specific game, not the free game page directly.

Dude, it’s been confirmed ages ago by Sweeeeeeneeeeey himself that devs get a lump payment and even if they didn’t this snag here wouldn’t be a prime candidate for supporting cuz the money goes to Take2 (eeewwww).

Numinar
 
I think I have all these on steam anyway but it's a good idea not to have all your eggs in one basket. Havn't been able to lose myself in one of these since Civ5, and havn't truly loved the series since 4, but it's still very well made, and I'm no hater-the changes are all in response to weaknesses in previous titles. it's just making something actually 10/10 fun is a kind of magic you need to luck into.

Also there are about 8 civs missing from the new frontiers pack, and the 16 alternate leaders fromt he leader pass, so don't think you've wrapped the bow on this thing yet!

data.text:
The summer sale is now underway on the
[Epic Games Store](https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/), offering
thousands of games with discounts, and a 20% Epic Rewards on all your purchases.
And since it's Thursday, the store features a new 100% discount, as everyone can
snag the Windows edition of
[
Sid Meier’s Civilization VI Platinum Edition](https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/sid-meiers-civilization-vi--platinum-edition) completely free. It's yours to
keep if you act by 11:00 am EDT next Thursday, when the store will begin handing
out free copies of
[Legion TD 2](https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/legion-td-2-a244b9).
Here's what's included in this bundle of the "just one more turn" strategy
sequel:
Sid Meier’s Civilization VI: Platinum Edition is the perfect entry point for PC gamers who have yet to experience the addictive gameplay that has made Civilization one of the greatest game series of all time.
- Sid Meier’s Civilization VI
- Civilization VI – Vikings Scenario Pack
- Civilization VI – Poland Civilization & Scenario Pack
- Civilization VI – Australia Civilization & Scenario Pack
- Civilization VI – Persia and Macedon Civilization & Scenario Pack
- Civilization VI – Nubia Civilization & Scenario Pack
- Civilization VI – Khmer and Indonesia Civilization & Scenario Pack
- Civilization VI: Rise and Fall expansion
- Civilization VI: Gathering Storm expansion
